name: Cheese Chase (Ignurof)
description:
Cheese Chase

The game about a mouse looking for its favorite source of energy.
Play in the top-down perspective, use obstacles to your advantage and make sure to Get the Cheese!

This game is my submission for GoGodotJam 2, and the first time I'm participating in a game jam.

Controls: WASD / Arrow keys

Lobby Time by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3986-lobby-time
